com.tokelon.toktales.desktop.lwjgl.ui

Interface IWindowContextFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DesktopWindowContextFactory, LWJGLWindowContextFactory

    public interface IWindowContextFactory
    Creates window context instances and window context builders, as well as factories for window context properties.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  IWindowContextFactory.IWindowContextIconSetterFactory
      Creates a window icon setter for a window context.
      static interface  IWindowContextFactory.IWindowContextInputDriverFactory
      Creates an input driver for a window context.
      static interface  IWindowContextFactory.IWindowContextRendererFactory
      Creates a window renderer for a window context.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IWindowContext createDefault()
      Creates a window context with the default properties of this factory.
      IWindowContextBuilder createDefaultBuilder()
      Creates a window context builder with the default properties of this factory.
      IWindowContextFactory.IWindowContextIconSetterFactory createDefaultIconSetterFactory()
      Creates a default icon setter factory.
      IWindowContextFactory.IWindowContextInputDriverFactory createDefaultInputDriverFactory()
      Creates a default input driver factory.
      IWindowContextFactory.IWindowContextRendererFactory createDefaultRendererFactory()
      Creates a default renderer factory.
      IWindowContextFactory.IWindowContextIconSetterFactory createIconSetterFactory(String iconPath)
      Creates an icon setter factory with the given icon path.

    • Method Detail

        Returns:
